definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
(only used in 膈應|膈应[ge4 ying5])
diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of diaphragm activity range to foreign body transmitted X-rays in bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价横膈动度对透X线性支气管异物的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Improper use of diaphragmatic breathing can lead to reproductive pathologies for women.
sentences.chinese: 不当使用横膈呼吸可导致生殖疾病的妇女。

sentences.english: Below the muscular diaphragm, which separates the chest cavity from the abdominal cavity, the esophagus joins the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在分隔胸腔和腹腔的肌质横膈的下界，食道和胃连接。

definition: diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
